languages.text: "Помни — каждый миг, что мы медлим, культисты отравляют своим дыханием воздух подле святыни! Отыщи время исполнить долг разящего клинка Империума, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Помни — каждый миг, что мы медлим, культисты отравляют своим дыханием воздух подле святыни! Отыщи время исполнить долг разящего клинка Империума, Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Помни — каждый миг, что мы медлим, культисты отравляют своим дыханием воздух подле святыни! Отыщи время исполнить долг разящего клинка Империума, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists get to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

"Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「覚えていてほしい。我々が手間取れば、教団があの凶悪な息で聖遺物の周りの空気を毒することになる！帝国の剣や自由開拓者として、自身の責務を果たす時間を見つけていただきたい」
languages.original_text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「覚えていてほしい。我々が手間取れば、教団があの凶悪な息で聖遺物の周りの空気を毒することになる！帝国の剣や自由開拓者として、自身の責務を果たす時間を見つけていただきたい」

languages.text: “别忘了，我们每耽搁一秒钟，那些邪教徒就会用他们邪恶的气息，玷污圣物周围的空气！请务必抽出时间，履行你身为帝国之剑的职责，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “别忘了，我们每耽搁一秒钟，那些邪教徒就会用他们邪恶的气息，玷污圣物周围的空气！请务必抽出时间，履行你身为帝国之剑的职责，行商浪人。”

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas que chaque instant perdu est une occasion de plus pour ces fanatiques de souiller de leur haleine fétide l'air qui entoure ce saint artefact ! À charge pour vous de trouver le temps d'accomplir votre devoir en tant que bras armé de l'Imperium, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas que chaque instant perdu est une occasion de plus pour ces fanatiques de souiller de leur haleine fétide l'air qui entoure ce saint artefact ! À charge pour vous de trouver le temps d'accomplir votre devoir en tant que bras armé de l'Imperium, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: «Recuerde que cada momento que esperamos es otro momento del que disponen esos cultistas para profanar el aire que rodea la reliquia con su inmundo aliento! Le ruego que encuentre el momento de ejercer de espada del Imperium, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerde que cada momento que esperamos es otro momento del que disponen esos cultistas para profanar el aire que rodea la reliquia con su inmundo aliento! Le ruego que encuentre el momento de ejercer de espada del Imperium, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Bedenkt, dass jedes Zögern den Kultisten mehr Zeit gibt, die Luft um das Relikt mit ihrem abstoßenden Atem zu vergiften! Findet die Zeit, Eure Pflicht als Schwert des Imperiums zu tun, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Bedenkt, dass jedes Zögern den Kultisten mehr Zeit gibt, die Luft um das Relikt mit ihrem abstoßenden Atem zu vergiften! Findet die Zeit, Eure Pflicht als Schwert des Imperiums zu tun, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: "Oyalandığımız her an tarikatçılar, habis nefesleriyle yadigârı çevreleyen havayı zehirliyor! İmparatorluk'un kılıcı olarak vazifeni yerine getirmeye zaman ayırmayı unutmayasın Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "Remember that every moment we tarry is another moment those cultists have to poison the air around the relic with their vile breath! Do find the time to do your duty as the Imperium's sword, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Oyalandığımız her an tarikatçılar, habis nefesleriyle yadigârın maruz kaldığı havayı zehirliyor! İmparatorluk'un kılıcı olarak görevin için zaman yaratmayı unutma Hür Tacir."
